<template>
    <button @click="onClick()" :style="{background: color}" 
    class="btn">{{text}}</button>
</template>

<script>
import { METHODS } from 'http';

    export default {
        name: 'Button',
        props:{
            text: String,
            color: String
        }
        methods: {
            onClick(){
                console.log('click');
            }
        }
    }
</script>
